comments:
The property tester (LaunchablePropertyTester) for showing the new Run/Debug settings property page does not check the existance of the resource from the getResource(..) method. When no IResource adapter exists for an element (in this case a SourceMethod from the outline view), we get null returned as the resource and the following error:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
